title: Synthwave Music: Cyberpunks And Gadgets
description: Synthwave feeling of Cyberpunk in a cool way, a content of 15 songs, which has "Full" and "Loop" versions.
longDescription:
The feeling of Cyberpunk in a cool way, "Synthwave Music" content of 15 songs, which has "Full" and "Loop" versions.


Before reading, please PREVIEW the entire package.


"What will happen when I buy the product?"


  • You will have 15 different full-length Synthwave songs. We wanted to compose different music on many different feelings. Total length is 42 minutes.
  • You will have both studio album outputs and LOOP versions of these 15 files. We've designed your LOOP files to flow seamlessly from start to finish.
  • If you are using software like Fmod Studio, each song has itsÂ BPM information on the WAV files.
  • Professional equipment is used, and by applying professional mastering processes, you'll have a polished Synthwave album.
  • The album supports UE 4.27 - 5.0 - 5.1 and 5.2 versions.


"Can we reach out to you?"


Yes, of course. Intersonic Sound also maintains a YouTube account. It is very easy for you to reach us on any subject via email (written on our seller page) or YouTube. We are always happy to communicate with you!


Subscribe to us: https://www.youtube.com/@intersonicsound

technicalDetails:
You can email us with new ideas and opinions, technical questions, corrections or inquiries, or even just to chat. Your feedback enhances the value of every product you purchase, and we consider it important.


FAQ


Can I use your products in my commercial projects without any restrictions?

Yes, absolutely! You can use them in all kinds of content, including films, games, or YouTube videos, even for commercial purposes.


Will there be a problem if I upload a video to YouTube that contains music from Intersonic Sound?

No, it won't. The products are not registered with Content ID and are structured to not claim rights. You will not receive a copystrike warning for your channel.


Do you update your products?

There are products that we have updated and will continue to update. We may not update all of them, but the likelihood of us adding new content to your purchased product as a free update is very high.


What file format do you use?

We prefer 24-bit WAV files. If the package size becomes too large, we might consider 16-bit WAV, but we have not done this yet. For now, we have processed every product as a 24-bit WAV.
